snippet: Munther Omar Saleh, 20, a student living in Queens who was arrested Saturday, is accused of plotting to attack New York City on behalf of the Islamic State, the authorities say.
abstract: Munther Omar Saleh, college student in Queens, is arrested and charged with conspiring to support Islamic State; police say Saleh had been planning terror attack on various New York City landmarks.
lead_paragraph: Munther Omar Saleh, 20, a student living in Queens who was arrested Saturday, is accused of plotting to attack New York City on behalf of the Islamic State, the authorities say.

headline.main: College Student in Queens Is Charged With Conspiring to Support ISIS
headline.print_headline: Queens Man Is Accused of Planning Terror Attack

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
